Class CompanyServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.service.data.impl.DataServiceImpl<T,E>
      • com.salimov.yurii.service.data.impl.ContentServiceImpl<Company,java.lang.Long>
        • com.salimov.yurii.service.data.impl.CompanyServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompanyService, ContentService<Company,java.lang.Long>, DataService<Company,java.lang.Long>

    @Service
 @ComponentScan(basePackages={"com.salimov.yurii.dao","com.salimov.yurii.service.data"})
public final class CompanyServiceImpl
extends ContentServiceImpl<Company,java.lang.Long>
implements CompanyService
    The class of the service layer, implements a set of methods for working with objects of the Company class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yurii.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Company, CompanyService, ContentServiceImpl, DataServiceImpl, CompanyDao
